title: Practical Applications of Advanced Cloud Services and Generative AI Systems in Medical Image Analysis
abstract: arXiv:2403.17549v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: The medical field is one of the important fields in the application of artificial intelligence technology. With the explosive growth and diversification of medical data, as well as the continuous improvement of medical needs and challenges, artificial intelligence technology is playing an increasingly important role in the medical field. Artificial intelligence technologies represented by computer vision, natural language processing, and machine learning have been widely penetrated into diverse scenarios such as medical imaging, health management, medical information, and drug research and development, and have become an important driving force for improving the level and quality of medical services.The article explores the transformative potential of generative AI in medical imaging, emphasizing its ability to generate syntheticACM-2 data, enhance images, aid in anomaly detection, and facilitate image-to-image translation. Title: Practical Applications of Advanced Cloud Services and Generative AI Systems in Medical Image Analysis
Abstract: arXiv:2403.17549v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: The medical field is one of the important fields in the application of artificial intelligence technology. With the explosive growth and diversification of medical data, as well as the continuous improvement of medical needs and challenges, artificial intelligence technology is playing an increasingly important role in the medical field. translated_title: 在医学图像分析中实际应用先进云服务和生成式人工智能系统
translated_abstract: arXiv:2403.17549v1 公告类型: 新摘要: 医学领域是人工智能技术应用中的重要领域之一。随着医疗数据的爆炸性增长和多样化，以及医疗需求和挑战的不断提升，人工智能技术在医学领域中发挥着越来越重要的作用。以计算机视觉、自然语言处理和机器学习为代表的人工智能技术已经广泛渗透到医学影像、健康管理、医疗信息和药物研发等各种场景中，成为提高医疗服务水平和质量的重要驱动力。本文探讨了生成式人工智能在医学影像中的转变潜力，强调了它生成合成数据、增强图像、帮助异常检测和促进图像转换等能力。
tldr: 生成式人工智能在医学影像中的转变潜力，能够生成合成数据、增强图像、帮助异常检测和促进图像转换。
en_tdlr: The transformative potential of generative AI in medical imaging lies in its ability to generate synthetic data, enhance images, aid in anomaly detection, and facilitate image-to-image translation.
